verses.text: \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H2204"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gray|strong="H7867"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H6258"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6258"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Bear|strong="H6030"\w* \w witness|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*: \w Whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w or|strong="H7794"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*? \w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* cheated \w or|strong="H7794"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w*? \w From|strong="H7725"\w* \w whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w accepted|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribe|strong="H3724"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* closed \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*? \w Tell|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \f + \fr 12:3 \ft Hebrew And I will restore it; LXX Testify against me, and I will restore it\f* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*.”

“\w You|strong="H3947"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wronged|strong="H6231"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3808"\w* replied, “\w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w anything|strong="H3972"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* man.”

Samuel said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w anything|strong="H3972"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.” “\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* replied.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w One|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \f + \fr 12:6 \ft Hebrew; LXX The LORD is the witness who\f* \w appointed|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w present|strong="H3320"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3320"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* confront \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6666"\w* \w acts|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers.

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,\f + \fr 12:8 \ft Hebrew; LXX includes and the Egyptians oppressed them\f* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7911"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgot|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sisera|strong="H5516"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*,\f + \fr 12:9 \ft LXX the army of Jabin king of Hazor\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Ashtoreths. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*,\f + \fr 12:11 \ft Jerubbaal is another name for Gideon and probably means let Baal contend; see Judges 6:32.\f* Barak,\f + \fr 12:11 \ft LXX and Syriac; Hebrew Bedan\f* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*,\f + \fr 12:11 \ft LXX and Syriac Samson\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* securely.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* moving \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, ‘\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w rule|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*’—\w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* chosen, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w requested|strong="H7592"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H5647"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4784"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w reigns|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w follow|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*.\f + \fr 12:14 \ft then all will be well is implied; Literally If you fear the LORD and serve Him and obey His voice, and if you do not rebel against the command of the LORD, (then) both you and the king who reigns over you will follow the LORD your God.\f*

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w disobey|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4784"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers.\f + \fr 12:15 \ft Hebrew; LXX against your king\f*

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*? \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w asking|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*. \w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* result, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* pleaded \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, “\w Pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w so|strong="H4191"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3254"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w asking|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

“\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*,” \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* replied. “\w Even|strong="H6213"\w* though \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* following \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.
